tags.documentation:
This is the XML defintion file used by the following scripts:
  • com.esarks.arm.report.GenerateReport

tag.name: jeo...
tag.documentation: A container tag for the Jeo.

tag.name: instance
tag.documentation: A specific instance of a Jeo.

tag.name: type
tag.documentation:
The type of Jeo instance.
  • Ex. assessment, document, detail

tag.name: column
tag.documentation: A container tag for the column.

tag.name: attribute
tag.documentation: The field name in the Jeo.

tag.name: nullable
tag.documentation: Indicates if the column may contain a null value.
